name: Touch Lines
description:
Touch Lines is a simple logic puzzle involving finding paths to connect numbers in a grid.

HOW TO PLAY
• Pair up all the matching numbers on the grid with single continuous lines.
• Numbers have to fall at the end of each line.
• LINEs can't branch off or cross over each other.
• All the cells in the grid are filled.

FEATURES
• 7 different board sizes
• Colorful Dots and UI
• Musical Sound Effects
• No Time Limit
